channel.title: xcode on Jade Meskill
channel.description: Recent content in xcode on Jade Meskill

item.title: How To Build iPhone 3.0 and iOS4 Apps On The Same Machine
item.description: It’s actually really easy, here’s how I’ve set it up: Install the XCode 3.2.3 with iOS4 in /Developer Install XCode 3.2.2 with iPhone OS 3.2 in /Developer322 Install latest XCode 4.0 developer preview in /DeveloperBeta This makes it trivially easy to support the older SDKs and toolsets for handling your legacy iPhone applications.
item.content:
It’s actually really easy, here’s how I’ve set it up:

Install the XCode 3.2.3 with iOS4 in /Developer

Install XCode 3.2.2 with iPhone OS 3.2 in /Developer322

Install latest XCode 4.0 developer preview in /DeveloperBeta

This makes it trivially easy to support the older SDKs and toolsets for handling your legacy iPhone applications.
